alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 6:16PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact Hamilton County through 645 PM EST... At 616 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Lake Park to 10 miles southwest of Madison. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, White Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Belmont, Blue Springs and Crossroads. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
